title: Impact of grape seed proanthocyanidin B2 pretreatment on mitochondrial oxidative stress, endoplasmic reticulum stress, and apoptosis in renal tubular epithelial cells during in-vitro hypoxia-reoxygenation.
abstract: To investigate the impact of grape seed proanthocyanidin B2 (GSPB2) pretreatment on hypoxia-reoxygenation model of HK-2 cells in vitro.
